hero.title: planning your lessons
hero.subtitle: We help teachers create fun, interactive lessons aligned with the AP curriculum and showing real-life examples. Save time on lesson planning and focus on what matters most: your students.

waiting.title: Get notified when we're launching.
waiting.subtitle: Join the waiting list and get 50% off the first year. We won’t spam you. We’ll use your email address only to notify you when we’re launching.
waiting.success: Thank you! We'll notify you when we're launching.
waiting.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

home.title: Educasso: Interactive lessons aligned with the AP curriculum
home.description: Create fun and interactive lessons with real-life examples aligned with the Advanced Placement curriculum. Learn how to save time on lesson planning for your students.
